title: section 55(3) of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2022 (Section 55) (Stardust Inquest Jury Summons) 
Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (section 55) (stardust inquest jury summons) regulation 2022

title: section 55(3) of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of
heading: 2. The form set out in the Schedule is prescribed for the purposes of
text_raw:
2. The form set out in the Schedule is prescribed for the purposes of 
section 55(3) of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 
2022). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [552] 3
text_norm: 2 form set schedule prescribed purpose section 55(3) civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (no 19 2022) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 8th november 2022 552 3

title: section 55(3) of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of
heading: Ceantar cróinéara Bhaile Átha Cliath
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Ceantar cróinéara Bhaile Átha Cliath 

TOGHAIRM GHIÚIRÉ i leith ionchoisní Stardust 

Uimhir na Toghairme…………………….. 

Ainm 

Seoladh 

2022, 

Ilghnéitheacha), 

Tugtar toghairm duit leis seo, de bhun alt 55(3) den Acht um an Dlí Sibhialta 
(Forálacha 
ag 
………………………………………………… chun giúróirí a ghlacadh i 
gcomhair 
lá de 
……………..……… 202 … ag ……… a chlog, agus ina dhiaidh sin ag an suí 
d’ionchoisne Stardust ó lá go lá ag an suíomh sin nó cibé suíomh nó áit eile a 
ordóidh an cróinéir do cheantar cróinéara Bhaile Átha Cliath, cibé tráthanna a 
ordóidh an cróinéir sin. 

ionchoisní Stardust Dé ……………..… an ……… 

freastal mar 

ghiúróir 

Is ceart uimhir na toghairme a lua in aon chomhfhreagras a bhaineann leis an 
toghairm seo agus é a sheoladh chuig an gCláraitheoir Contae. 

Arna dhátú 

Arna shíniú 

An Cláraitheoir Contae 

Contae Bhaile Átha Cliath 

Teileafón ……… 

stardustjury@courts.ie 

TABHAIR DO d’AIRE: Ní foláir duit an Toghairm Ghiúiré seo a 
thabhairt chuig ionchoisní Stardust leat ar an dáta ar a dtoghairtear thú 
chun freastal mar ghiúróir. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [552] 

Name 

Address 

Coroner’s district of Dublin 

JURY SUMMONS in respect of the Stardust inquests 

Number of Summons…………………….. 

You are hereby summoned, pursuant to section 55(3) of the Civil Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 
at 
………………………………………………….for the reception of jurors for 
the Stardust 
inquests on……………..…………the …………….day of 
…………….202…at………….o’clock, and thereafter at the sitting of a 
Stardust inquest from day to day at that location or such other location or place 
as the coroner for the coroner’s district of Dublin may direct, at such times as 
are directed by that coroner. 

attend 

juror 

as 

to 

a 

Any correspondence relating to this summons should quote the number of the 
summons and should be addressed to the County Registrar. 

Dated 

Signed 

County Registrar 

County of Dublin 

Telephone……… 

stardustjury@courts.ie 

NOTE: You must bring this Jury Summons to the Stardust inquests with 
you on the date you are summoned to attend as a juror. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [552] 5 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 November, 2022. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [552]

title: section 55(3) of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations prescribe a form of jury summons for the purposes of 
summoning jurors for a Stardust inquest as provided for in Section 55(3) of the 
Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 

 
 
 
 
 [552] 7
